pageTitle: Do you and your partner get pension age Housing Benefit?

partnerGetsHousingBenefit.hint: A Housing Benefit claim is likely to be pension age Housing Benefit if you made a claim as a couple before 15 May 2019.
partnerGetsHousingBenefit.required: Select yes if you and your partner get pension age Housing Benefit.
partnerGetsHousingBenefit.change: Change whether you and your partner get pension age Housing Benefit
